allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete GhostOverlay monitoring application

Implemented a Windows desktop overlay application for real-time server monitoring
with support for HTTP/HTTPS, ICMP Ping, and TCP port checks.

Features:
- Transparent always-on-top overlay window with click-through mode
- Real-time status monitoring with color-coded indicators (Up/Slow/Down)
- MVVM architecture with dependency injection
- System tray integration with notification support
- Global hotkey support (Ctrl+Shift+O)
- Configuration management with import/export
- Dark theme with customizable settings
- Serilog structured logging

Technical stack:
- .NET 8.0 WPF application
- Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting for DI
- Three monitoring services (HTTP, Ping, TCP)
- MVVM pattern with ViewModels
- Win32 interop for hotkey registration

Architecture:
- Models: Endpoint, MonitorResult, AppSettings
- Services: MonitoringService, ConfigService, NotificationService
- ViewModels: OverlayViewModel, EndpointResultViewModel
- Views: OverlayWindow, SettingsWindow, AddMonitorWindow
- Helpers: HotkeyHelper, TrayIconHelper, Value Converters
EOF
)")
